thread.title: we had the best time in the hotel!!
thread.title_full: we had the best time in the hotel!! - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: einat1416
title: we had the best time in the hotel!!
text:
we came to london to celebrate my daugther birthday, and the Amba hotel cherring cross was the best desicion we made!
everything was just perfect! the room, the location,the free minibar, the great "birthday cake" we recived. and more then all JULIA and FILIPA smile and help.
when we left ' after wonderfull 5 days in london' my daugther told me that the best
place in london in the Amba hotel!
we will come again!!!
thank you:)
